custom_constraint.condition: resource.sourceImage.matches ('(.*Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9*.|^$)') || resource.sourceImage.matches ('(.*Windows Server 2022 Datacenter*.|^$)')
custom_constraint.description: Restricts the creation of virtual machines using the Red Hat 9 family from the rhel-cloud project and Windows Server 2022 from the windows-cloud project.
custom_constraint.display_name: Public Cloud Platform: Restrict Red Hat 9 and Windows Server 2022 Family Marketplace Images
